;; Thu, 16 Nov 2023 06:26:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 推进生态文明建设需要处理好几个重大关系http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20231116_2-01.htm
;Thursday, November 16, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 15th  The 22nd issue of "Qiushi" published on November 16th The magazine will publish an important article by Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, "Promoting the Construction of Ecological Civilization Needs to Handle Several Major Relationships."

;

;The article emphasizes that with the deepening of the practice of ecological civilization construction in the new era, our understanding of the regularity of ecological civilization construction continues to deepen. To summarize the 10 years of practical experience in the new era, analyze the new situations and new problems we are currently facing, and continue to promote the construction of ecological civilization, we must be guided by the thought of socialist ecological civilization with Chinese characteristics for a new era and correctly handle several major relationships.

;

;The article points out that the first is to correctly handle the relationship between high-quality development and high-level protection. High-quality development and high-level protection complement and complement each other. High-level protection is an important support for high-quality development. High-quality development that prioritizes ecology, green and low carbon can only be achieved by relying on high-level protection. Throughout the entire process of Chinese-style modernization, we must grasp the dialectical and unified relationship between high-quality development and high-level protection. We must plan development from the perspective of harmonious coexistence between man and nature, take the carrying capacity of resources and the environment as the premise and foundation, and consciously limit economic activities and human behavior to the limits that natural resources and the ecological environment can bear. Through high-level protection, we will continue to create new momentum and new advantages for development, strive to build a green and low-carbon circular economic system, effectively reduce the resource and environmental costs of development, and continue to enhance the potential and stamina of development.

;

;The article pointed out that the second is to correctly handle the relationship between key tasks and collaborative governance. Ecological environment management is a systematic project that requires overall consideration of the complexity of environmental factors, the integrity of the ecosystem, the continuity of natural geographical units, and the sustainability of economic and social development. It is necessary to adhere to the system concept, seize the main contradictions and main aspects of contradictions, take effective measures to highlight ecological and environmental issues, and at the same time strengthen target coordination, multi-pollutant control coordination, departmental coordination, regional coordination, and policy coordination, and continuously enhance the effectiveness of various tasks. Systematic, holistic and collaborative. At present, we must maintain strategic focus and continue to fight the tough battle against pollution.

;

;The article points out that the third is to correctly handle the relationship between natural restoration and artificial restoration. First of all, we must fully respect and comply with nature, give nature enough time and space to recuperate, and rely on the power of nature to restore the balance of the ecosystem. At the same time, the limitations and limits of natural restoration have put forward higher requirements for artificial restoration, leaving a vast space for positive actions. It is necessary to organically unify natural recovery and artificial restoration, implement policies according to local conditions, time conditions, and classification, and strive to find the best solution for ecological protection and restoration. Adhere to the integrated protection and systematic management of mountains, rivers, forests, fields, lakes, grass and sand, build a large-scale protection and management pattern from the top of the mountain to the ocean, comprehensively use natural restoration and artificial restoration methods, and continuously promote ecological construction.

;

;The article points out that the fourth is to correctly handle the relationship between external constraints and endogenous motivation. A good ecological environment is the fairest public product and the most universal welfare for people. Only when everyone takes action and fulfills their responsibilities, and stimulates the endogenous motivation of the whole society to jointly protect the ecological environment, can the blue sky, green mountains and green waters of China last forever. We must always adhere to the strictest system and strictest rule of law to protect the ecological environment and maintain normalized external pressure.

;

;The article points out that the fifth is to correctly handle the relationship between "double carbon" commitments and independent actions. Promoting carbon peak and carbon neutrality is a major strategic decision made by the Party Central Committee after careful consideration. It is our solemn commitment to the international community. It is also an intrinsic requirement to promote the transformation and upgrading of the economic structure, form a competitive advantage in green and low-carbon industries, and achieve high-quality development. The "double carbon" goal we are committed to is unwavering, but the path and method, rhythm and intensity of achieving this goal should and must be decided by ourselves and will never be influenced by others. It is necessary to accelerate the planning and construction of new energy systems to ensure energy security. Optimize and adjust the industrial structure so that development is based on efficient use of resources, strict protection of the ecological environment, and effective control of greenhouse gas emissions. For traditional industries, it is necessary to promote the upgrading of processes, technologies, and equipment to achieve green and low-carbon transformation. It is necessary to participate in global climate governance with a more active attitude and form a new situation that is more proactive and beneficial.

;; Thu, 16 Nov 2023 06:26:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 让产业合作的桥越筑越牢、和平发展的路越走越广http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20231116_3-01.htm
;Thursday, November 16, 2023
; ;

;“Achieving the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation has opened up broad space for cross-Strait economic cooperation, and realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation requires the joint efforts of compatriots on both sides of the strait. ”

;

;On the 14th, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the 10th anniversary annual meeting of the 2023 Cross-Strait Entrepreneurs Summit, clarifying the consensus and truth that the cross-Strait economy belongs to the Chinese national economy and that compatriots on both sides are a community of destiny , declared the principled position of being committed to promoting cross-Strait economic exchanges and cooperation, deepening the integrated development of various fields across the Strait, helping Taiwan compatriots and Taiwanese enterprises integrate into the new development pattern, and achieve high-quality development, fully reflecting the support for the cross-Strait business circles, business circles and the majority of Taiwan compatriots. The care and concern of Taiwanese companies.

;

;Business people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait are very excited and inspired. Everyone expressed that they should be guided by the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter, work together, seize new opportunities, and seek new development together, so that the bridge of cross-Strait economic and industrial cooperation will be built stronger and stronger, and the path of peaceful development of cross-Strait relations will be wider and wider.

;

;;“The General Secretary’s concern gives us more confidence to invest in the trend of high-quality development.”;

;

;In Nanjing in early winter, the sun is warm and the weather is clear. clear. About 800 people from all walks of life on both sides of the Taiwan Strait gathered together to listen carefully to General Secretary Xi Jinping’s congratulatory message.

;

;Since its establishment in 2013, the Cross-Strait Entrepreneur Summit Association has held an annual meeting every year. Along the way, the summit cooperation model has been continuously expanded, and cross-strait economic and trade cooperation has been fruitful.

;

;Lai Cheng-yi, chairman of the Taiwan Chamber of Commerce, has never been absent from this "annual event" for business circles on both sides of the Taiwan Strait. "I see more and more Taiwanese companies finding investment opportunities and achieving career development through the summit." He said, as General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out in his congratulatory letter, the Cross-Strait Entrepreneurs Summit is an important platform for exchanges and cooperation between cross-Strait companies and business people. , played an important role in promoting cross-Strait economic cooperation and deepening cross-Strait integrated development.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter inspired Lai: “Mainland’s policy of favoring Taiwan is consistent and full of continuity. This congratulatory letter further demonstrates the mainland’s sincerity and goodwill, and strengthens the confidence of our Taiwanese businessmen in the new development pattern. The confidence to seize the opportunity and move forward."

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized in his congratulatory letter that we will continue to be committed to promoting cross-Strait economic exchanges and cooperation, deepening cross-Strait integrated development in all fields, and improving the well-being of Taiwan compatriots. Systems and policies help Taiwanese compatriots and enterprises to integrate into the new development pattern and achieve high-quality development.

;

;“The warm words encourage Taiwan compatriots and Taiwanese enterprises to take root in the mainland and create new opportunities.” Li Zhenghong, president of the National Taiwan Compatriots Investment Enterprise Association, said that the majority of Taiwanese businessmen and enterprises will live up to the expectations of the General Secretary. Actively integrate into the high-quality development of the mainland and work together to strengthen the Chinese national economy.

;

;In 2005, the company’s revenue was less than 10 million yuan (RMB, the same below); in 2022, it will exceed 200 million yuan. This is a set of data often mentioned by Zhang Yuwei, general manager of Nanjing Nante Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. “Before coming to the mainland, we couldn’t have imagined this kind of development speed,” he said.

;

;Recently, the high-end manufacturing equipment industry has become a “new track” that Zhang Yuwei is optimistic about. He decided to spend money to renovate the workshop and prepare for industrial upgrading and adjustment. General Secretary Xi Jinping's congratulatory letter reiterated his care and support for Taiwanese companies and compatriots, making him even more convinced that he made the right decision.

;

;In Changzhou, Jiangsu, the production workshop of Damao Weirike Auto Lighting Co., Ltd. is in full swing. Seizing the "window" of the rapid development of mainland's new energy vehicle industry, this Taiwan-funded enterprise's R&D and production are gradually getting better.

;

;“I am very grateful to the General Secretary for his concern for the development of Taiwan-funded enterprises, which gives us more confidence to invest in the high-quality development of the times. We will seize the opportunity to create a win-win situation with mainland manufacturers and contribute to the high-quality development of the cross-strait economy. Make due contributions." said Zhu Jianzhou, the company's senior project director.

;

;;"Mainland is always the best choice for Taiwanese businessmen to invest and start businesses";

;

;"The General Secretary pointed out in his congratulatory letter that the economies on both sides of the Taiwan Strait belong to the Chinese national economy. Compatriots are a community with a shared future. For Want Want, we feel the same way," said Lin Tianliang, Beijing chief representative of Want Want Group, a Taiwanese company.

;

;After entering the mainland market for more than 30 years, Want Want Group, which started out by producing rice crackers, has established more than 40 branches and more than 110 factories in various places, and its products are exported to more than 60 countries and regions.

;

;"The mainland has a vast territory and endless potential. In recent years, many Taiwanese companies have been active in new energy, 'Belt and Road' construction, rural revitalization and other fields, sharing the vast opportunities of Chinese-style modernization." Lin Tianliang said, No matter in the past, present or future, the mainland has always been the best choice for Taiwanese businessmen to invest and start businesses.

;

;As the world's leading manufacturer of professional display equipment, Taiwan's TPV Technology Group has been deeply involved in the mainland market for more than 30 years and has been listed on the A-share market. General Secretary Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter impressed Group Vice President Wang Bilu deeply. It was the opportunity unleashed by the development of the digital economy in mainland China that became an important driving force for TPV Technology’s growth and transformation.

;

;"The mainland has a vast domestic demand market, is connected to a huge external demand market, and builds a new 'dual circulation' development pattern, which can benefit Taiwanese enterprises and promote the integrated development of cross-strait economies." Wang Bilu said.

;

;In 2019, Xu Guansheng, chairman of the Taiwan Artificial Intelligence Development Association, settled in Xiamen and opened a technology company. R&D projects include mobile robots, Yuanverse fitness, etc.

;

;Xu Guansheng’s heart surged when he read the congratulatory letter from General Secretary Xi Jinping on the mobile phone client. "Mainland is the most suitable place for Taiwanese to start a business because we share the same culture and race, and we have different advantages in capital, market, technology, talent, etc. When developing in the mainland, you can always feel the warmth of a shared destiny and a close family. ."

;

;As early as more than 10 years ago, China Electric (Jiangsu) Transformer Manufacturing Co., Ltd. began to cooperate with Taiwanese companies. Looking back on the process of enterprises on both sides of the Taiwan Strait working together to build a supply chain, General Manager Lu Han said that "working together as one heart" is a true portrayal.

;

;“General Secretary Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter made me deeply feel that the country attaches great importance to cross-strait economic cooperation. Entrepreneurs on both sides of the strait must seize new opportunities, strengthen cooperation at a higher level and in wider areas, and maintain mutual economic benefits across the strait. A win-win situation will promote the integrated development of cross-strait industries." Lu Han said.

;

;;“Stand firmly on the right side of history and bravely shoulder the responsibilities of the times”;

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized in his congratulatory letter that the realization of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation is an important step for both sides of the Taiwan Strait. Economic cooperation opens up vast space, and realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation requires the joint efforts of compatriots on both sides of the Taiwan Straits.

;

;Hunan Taiwanese businessmen Zheng Congjun and Zheng Yang, father and son, said that their own experience is a vivid portrayal of this passage. Starting from making cream cakes on the streets of Changsha, it has expanded to the tourism, culture, and tourism industries, and recently established an e-commerce live broadcast team... "We have followed the wave of reform and opening up in the mainland and written wonderful stories about family businesses. We deeply understand that, The development of the times and the rejuvenation of the nation allow everyone and every family to benefit from it."

;

;The Zhengs and his son have regarded Hunan as their "second hometown." "While enjoying the dividends of mainland China's development, we are willing to contribute to the development of our motherland," Zheng Yang said.

;

;“I am deeply excited after reading the congratulatory letter.” Chen Hongjie, a Guangzhou Taiqing investor who is engaged in blockchain investment, said that the mainland pays great attention to youth entrepreneurship and technological innovation. “We young people should actively respond to the General Secretary’s call, Let’s give full play to our strengths and work together to help the integrated development of both sides of the Taiwan Strait and build a beautiful home together.”

;

;“Historically, batches of entrepreneurs have traveled across the Taiwan Strait and jointly created deeply embedded cross-Strait industries. supply chain." Jiang Ansong, a young entrepreneur and deputy general manager of Changzhou Juhe New Materials Co., Ltd., said, "Facing the future, enterprises on both sides of the Taiwan Strait have the responsibility to strengthen cooperation, deepen cross-strait integrated development, and promote the peaceful development of cross-strait relations and the reunification of the motherland. The great cause has laid a solid foundation for public opinion."

;

;In the venue of the 10th anniversary annual meeting of the 2023 Cross-Strait Entrepreneurs Summit, a cross-strait youth contemporary art and cultural creativity exhibition called "The Perfect Golden Ou" was held simultaneously. Nearly 300 sets of works by about 100 artists from both sides of the Taiwan Strait reflect the deep feelings of compatriots on both sides of the Taiwan Strait who are connected by blood and develop through integration.

;

;Hong Wei, a designer from Taipei, is the person in charge of the exhibition. "The golden moon is intact, and the bright moon will be reunited. In this name, we hope that the two sides of the Taiwan Strait will strengthen cultural exchanges and industrial cooperation, enhance cultural identity, and promote the realization of spiritual harmony." She said that General Secretary Xi Jinping's congratulatory letter made her more determined to promote cross-Strait culture and creativity The career choice of peaceful reunification.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized in his congratulatory letter: "We hope that entrepreneurs on both sides of the Taiwan Strait will uphold the national righteousness, grasp the historical trend, bravely shoulder the responsibilities of the times, jointly promote the peaceful development and integrated development of cross-Strait relations, and jointly create the reunification of the motherland and national rejuvenation. A great historical achievement!"

;

;The sincere expectations are full of infinite affection; the sincere entrustment condenses the strength for progress.

;

;“For Taiwanese businessmen and enterprises to oppose ‘Taiwan independence’ and promote reunification, it is not only a matter of great interest, but also a matter of their own interests.” Wu Jiaying, executive vice president of the National Federation of Taiwan Enterprises, said, “We must Stand firmly on the right side of history, bravely shoulder the responsibilities of the times, and work hard to strengthen the Chinese national economy, so that the bridge of cross-Strait economic and industrial cooperation will be built stronger and stronger, and the path of peaceful development of cross-Strait relations will become wider and wider!"

;

;(Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 15th  Participating in the interview and writing: Pan Qing, He Leijing, Zhang Yujie, Chen Shengwei, Fu Min, Hong Zehua)

;; Thu, 16 Nov 2023 06:26:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 实实在在办好惠民利民实事（学思想 强党性 重实践 建新功）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/16/nw.D110000renmrb_20231116_4-01.htm
;Thursday, November 16, 2023
; ;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized during his inspection in Jiangxi: “Practical requirements must be implemented throughout the entire process of thematic education, and resolutely prevent and overcome Formalism and bureaucracy, we must do a good job in theoretical study and investigation and research, we must review and rectify outstanding problems, we must do practical things that benefit the people, and use hard work to promote development and win the trust of the people.”

;

;Since the launch of the second batch of education on the theme of studying and implementing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, education in various places has guided party members and cadres to firmly establish the concept of political achievements that benefit the people, insist on asking the people for their plans and needs, and focus on solving problems for the people. The people are facing urgent, difficult and anxious problems, and practical things that benefit the people have been done well, and the people's sense of gain, happiness, and security have been continuously enhanced.

;

;;Do a good job in the "key little things" that the masses care about;

;

;The second batch of thematic education is carried out around the masses. All localities insist on highlighting the word "real", so as to We should start with the most direct and practical interest issues that concern the people the most, and strive to handle the "key little things" that the people care about.

;

;In Happy Home in Juxiang, Xilin County, Baise City, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, the issue of electricity bill pricing once troubled residents. Residents reported this problem through the "Mashang Service" mini program, and the party member grid leader quickly "accepted the order." County and town-level cadres and lawyers came to the scene to conduct "face-to-face mediation" for the owners and property owners. After negotiation, the electricity meters in the community were handed over to the electric company for management, and the problem was solved.

;

;Xilin County makes good use of the "Mashang Service" mini program in thematic education, innovatively explores the "alley housekeeper, five-step service" rural micro-governance work method, and responds to the reasonable demands of the masses in a timely manner. The mini program is currently registered Users have covered 52,000 households, and the resolution rate of problems and complaints reached 92%.

;

;“The subsidy has reduced our living burden, and I feel warm in my heart.” Kelsang Quzhen lives in Jiri Street, Chengguan District, Lhasa City, Tibet Autonomous Region. Her family of four rents a house and recently got the Chengguan District residence permit. Rental subsidies for low-income urban families issued by the Construction Bureau. Tibet has vigorously carried out public service activities such as "doing practical things when called upon by the people", "solving problems as soon as complaints are received", and "helping to provide relief" to warm people's hearts. It has initially collected 1,662 issues from various regions (cities) and counties (cities, districts). , and refine the plan based on its own actual situation, focusing on solving shortcomings and weaknesses.

;

;People’s livelihood is no small matter. In thematic education, local education guides party members and cadres to go deep into the masses, stay close to the masses, serve the masses, and handle matters of concern to the people one by one.

;

;Zoumatang Village, Yinzhou District, Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province, is a well-known tourist destination. With an increasing number of self-driving tourists, the problem of charging new energy vehicles once became a headache for the village. In the themed education, the State Grid Ningbo Yinzhou District Power Supply Company organized a special action to "solve problems and promote development". Focusing on serving new energy vehicles in the countryside, it explored a model of jointly building charging facilities between villages and enterprises, using all-inclusive investment, operation and maintenance, and electricity fee income. The sharing mechanism not only meets the needs of rural charging, but also increases the income of the village collective. At present, all five public charging piles in the public parking lot of Zoumatang Village have been put into use.

;

;;Improve the system and mechanism to solve people's livelihood problems;

;

;The system is to manage the fundamentals and the long-term. In the second batch of thematic education, all localities adhere to the combination of "immediate change" and "long-term establishment", from "analyzing a problem" to "solving a type of problem", and strive to improve the system and mechanism to solve people's livelihood problems.

;

;When investigating service windows, the Public Security Bureau of Siyang County, Suqian City, Jiangsu Province found that the masses had many demands for household registration services, so they started with the issues that the masses had strongly reported and promoted "cross-station" household registration. The pilot project allows people to handle household registration matters at their nearest location without being restricted by their place of residence; based on the data on household registration matters, the first batch of 24 household registration high-frequency matters was sorted out, and a special "cross-registration" window was set up. Since the business went online, the Siyang County Administrative Service Hall has handled 518 household registration transactions and received more than 380 consultations from the public.

;

;Since the launch of the second batch of thematic education, various localities have taken the "four grassroots" as an important starting point. The majority of party members and cadres have jumped down and sunk to the front line, actively exploring and carrying out "people call me for" and "receiving" "Subject to immediate action" and so on, to smooth channels for the masses to reflect their opinions.

;

;The weather is dry. In order to solve the peach orchard irrigation problem, Zeng Rongfu, a peach grower in Baoshi Village, Longquanyi District, Chengdu City, Sichuan Province, dialed the 12345 hotline. Soon, the street and water bureau worked together to deal with the relevant problems in a timely manner.

;

;Chengdu has improved the 12345 hotline to "answer calls, answer on-site (or transfer for supervision), analyze and report, and file if satisfied" and the organizer to "accept complaints, handle implementation, reply within a time limit, and file the results". Closed-loop mechanism to actively respond to the demands of the masses. Since the launch of the second batch of thematic education, more than 7,200 suggestions and responses to public issues have been recorded, and 46 problems have been sorted out, and solutions are being actively promoted.

;

;Changqing District, Jinan, Shandong Province has highlighted problem-oriented issues and carried out in-depth grassroots research around nine aspects including people's livelihood demands. It has implemented "big starting point, big investigation and big rectification" to sort out and form a list of district-level problems. 28 items, 273 street and town department problem lists, promoted more than 17,000 grassroots party organizations, party members, and cadres to commit to serving the people, responded to more than 1,380 people's appeals, "rainwater and sewage diversion", renovation of old communities, and delivery of heating to new communities Waiting for a number of hot issues concerning people's livelihood to be resolved.

;

;;Improve people’s quality of life;

;

;In the Day Care Center for the Elderly in Ji’an County, Ji’an City, Jiangxi Province, hundreds of elderly people play ball, chat and eat here every day , there was laughter and laughter from time to time, it was so lively.

;

;Ji'an County actively builds a smart elderly care platform to collect basic information, establish health files, and provide emergency assistance, remote Online services such as positioning and offline services such as shopping for goods and psychological counseling. Since the launch of the second batch of themed education, the platform has served a total of 1,038 people online, 602 people offline, and implemented 21 emergency rescues.

;

;In the theme education, various localities focus on solving outstanding problems in the fields of people's livelihood such as employment, education, medical care, childcare, housing, and elderly care, and establish a list of people's livelihood projects to continuously improve the quality of people's lives.

;

;Pizhou City, Jiangsu Province combines thematic education with in-depth implementation of the "Quarterly Review" activity of mobile red flags to strive for status and compare performance. Every quarter, the progress of key tasks in each town (street) is reminded and ranked, and municipal-level agencies are All departments and units conduct evaluations. Ten key people's livelihood projects, including sewage treatment facility projects, mass housing improvement projects, and rural regional elderly care service center construction projects, are being steadily advanced to ensure that good things are done well.

;

;Lanzhou City, Gansu Province insists on combining thematic education with the promotion of people's livelihood work, carries out the "petition to the people to ask for warmth" action, establishes the "petition for the people to ask for warmth" action headquarters, mobilizes relevant party members and cadres, and resident party members , property companies and other forces have gone down to the grid to effectively solve residents' heating problems. A total of more than 200,000 households have been "petitioning for warmth" actions, and 2,654 problems have been solved on the spot.

;

;When the people call, I respond. The majority of party members and cadres have a high sense of responsibility and mission, constantly improve their ability to serve the people, and put the work of benefiting people's livelihood, warming people's hearts, and satisfying public opinion into the hearts of the people, so that the people can truly see the results of thematic education.

;

;(Our reporters Yuan Quan, Xu Yuyao, Wang Mingfeng, Yin Yan, and Zhu Jiaqi participated in the reporting)

;Thursday, November 16, 2023
; ;

;"As of the end of June, China's installed renewable energy capacity has reached 1.322 billion kilowatts""China's installed solar and wind energy capacity in 2023 will be far ahead in the world”... The 2023 annual meeting of the China Council for International Cooperation on Environment and Development was held in Beijing in August. Speaking of China’s energy transition and renewable energy development, Vice Chairman of the CCICED, Deputy Secretary-General of the United Nations, and "This is really amazing," said Anderson, executive director of UNEP.

;

;The CCICED was established in 1992 and is an international high-level policy advisory body. It is precisely because of years of continuous research that senior figures, experts and scholars in the field of environment and development at home and abroad have gained insight into the unremitting efforts and amazing results of the world's largest developing country in promoting green and low-carbon development.

;

;Let’s take a look at two impressive columnar trend charts first.

;

;A picture shows coal.

;

;In 2012, 68.5%; in 2017, 60.6%; in 2022, 56.2% - the proportion of coal in primary energy consumption has steadily declined year by year.

;

;Promoting the green and low-carbon transformation of the energy structure, "coal-rich" China ranks first in the world in installed hydropower, wind power, and photovoltaic power generation. In the first half of this year, the installed capacity of renewable energy historically surpassed coal power.

;

;Another picture shows a new energy vehicle.

;

;In 2014, there were 220,000 vehicles; in 2017, 1.534 million vehicles; in 2022, 13.1 million vehicles; as of the end of September this year, there were more than 18.2 million vehicles - the number of new energy vehicles in the country has increased significantly year by year.

;

;The construction of a green and low-carbon transportation system is accelerating. More than half of the world's new energy vehicles are driving in China, and production and sales have ranked first in the world for eight consecutive years.

;

;The period between “down” and “up” represents a solid step towards green development that prioritizes ecology, and a tenacious struggle to climb over obstacles and overcome difficulties.

;

;What continues to decline is energy consumption per unit of GDP, carbon dioxide emissions, water consumption... and what continues to rise is forest coverage, grassland vegetation coverage, per capita park green space...a series of data It shows that the resource and environmental costs of my country's economic growth continue to decrease, and the "green content" and "gold content" of economic and social development continue to increase.

;

;Thousands of miles of rivers and mountains become more colorful.

;

;The water is clearer, the sky is bluer, and the ground is greener. Environmental monitoring data confirms the tangible and tangible experiences in our daily lives.

;

;For example, the proportion of national surface water sections with excellent quality will rise to 87.9% in 2022, which is close to the level of developed countries. In the first three quarters of this year, it increased by 0.8 percentage points compared with the same period last year.

;

;For another example, in 2022, the proportion of days with good air quality in 339 cities at the prefecture level and above reached 86.5%.
